title: Sri Lanka rupee quoted 367.30 to TT dollar
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s commercial banks quoted the rupee at 367.3 against telegraphic transfers on Friday (3) while the central bank kept the interbank spot trade at 360.3 under a daily guidance rate.
Commercial banks were quoting 357.5/367.5 for telegraphic transfer dollars on Tuesday flat from the previous day.
Some banks were also quoting the rupee at 365.30 for TT dollar on Friday.
Tthe central bank guidance margin was set at 360.3 rupees plus 1.00 rupees or minus 4.00 rupees.

Sri Lanka’s central bank started quoting a guidance rate for interbank market at around 360 to the US dollar in May, about 20 to 30 rupees below the market rate at the time where a higher level of middle remittances was also starting to come from exchange houses. (Colombo/ June 04/2022)
